com.google.mu.util

Interface Premise


  • public interface Premise
    Result of a previously evaluated condition. Used to fluently chain API calls like Optionals.ifPresent(). For example: 
       ifPresent(getStory(), Story::tell)
       .or(() -> ifPresent(getJoke(), Joke::tell))
       .orElse(() -> print("can't tell"));
    Since:
    1.14

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <E extends Throwable>
      Premise      		 or(CheckedSupplier<? extends Premise,E> alternative)
      Evaluates alternative if this premise doesn't hold.
      <E extends Throwable>
      void      		 orElse(CheckedRunnable<E> block)
      Runs block if this premise doesn't hold.
